author: seedstars
title: Hackaton for Entrepreneurs
description: 85% of the global population live in emerging and frontier markets and they lack information about Blockchain, Cardano, and Catalyst.
solution: Create a hackathon series for DApps with Entrepreneurs in 4 physical hubs in Emerging Markets, with the best ideas to be funded in F8.
experience: We support entrepreneurs in 90+ countries growing and scaling their companies to create meaningful and lasting change. + info seedstars.com
